actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads.

official_title: To prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from requiring the sounding of a locomotive horn in suburban areas in nonpeak traffic hours.

summary.text: Amends federal transportation law to prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from requiring the sounding of a locomotive horn in suburban areas in nonpeak traffic hours.

titles.title: To prohibit the Secretary of Transportation from requiring the sounding of a locomotive horn in suburban areas in nonpeak traffic hours.
